casebody.data:
RIPELLINO
v.
BOARD OF EDUCATION. No. 180A06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 23, 2006. Stephanie H. Autry, Rachel B. Esposito, Meredith T. Black, Raleigh, James R. Lawrence, Jr., for Johnston County Bd. of Ed. Barbara B. Weyher, T. Carlton Younger, III, for School Boards, et al. *569Christopher Z. Campbell, K. Dean Shatley, Asheville, for NC Council of School of Attys.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 23rd day of August 2006 by Plaintiffs for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Plaintiffs (Michael Ripellino, et al) shall have up to and including the 29th day of September 2006 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 23rd day of August 2006."
